amendment.description: Amendment prevents employees or officers of an Executive Agency from using private email accounts when discussing a pending agency regulatory actions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 114-744 to restrict employees or officers of an Executive Agency from usin g private email accounts when discussing a pending agency regulatory action with the public.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. McKinley.
